citations.narrative:
The applicant has been operating as a dealer after the license had expired on 02-September-2025. Five puppies were
sold on 08-September-2025 following the license expiration. Conducting regulated activity without a valid license prevents
APHIS officials from determining compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by ensuring that a valid license is
obtained before operating as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction or sale.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 16-November-2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
2.1(a) 
   
Requirements and application 
The applicant has been operating as a dealer after the license had expired on 02-September-2025. Five puppies were 
sold on 08-September-2025 following the license expiration. Conducting regulated activity without a valid license prevents 
APHIS officials from determining compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by ensuring that a valid license is 
obtained before operating as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction or sale. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 16-November-2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license 
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
